Title: Mandates comprehensive, medically accurate and age appropriate sex education be taught in all public schools, grades one through twelve
Summary: Mandates comprehensive, medically accurate and age appropriate sex education be taught in all public schools, grades one through twelve; provides that the commissioner of education will create and establish a curriculum to accomplish such goal within one year of the effective date of this legislation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to mandating sex education in elementary and high schools
